reviewtext: Screen small...hard to read while driving.Battery eater. I use the DC adapter, however.No maps.Not enough contrast on screen. With sunglasses while driving, can't see screen.Tiny print on "Goto" destination. Impossible to read while driving.Good, quick operation once you learn it..Does everything it says it will.I like it except for the above things....
summary: Works, but here is what I don't like about it...
